entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text:
@DonaldJTrumpJr @realDonaldTrump Stifled giggles? More like incredulous bewilderment!

"Usually straitlaced &solemn in his delivery of up-to-the-minute health advice, Australia's Chief Medical Officer stifled giggles when asked about Trump's latest suggested treatments for coronavirus"
👇
https://t.co/2pYFmYxR2v
